name: Educational Attainment - Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010)
title: Educational Attainment - Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010)
description: Christopher Farris kindly provided this dataset and shared it with Max Roser via email. It shows average years of schooling of the population aged 15 and over.

sources.name: Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Barro, Robert and Jong-Wha (2010), A New Data Set of Educational Attainment in the World, 1950-2010. Journal of Development Economics, vol 104, pp.184-198
sources.additionalInfo: Christopher Farris kindly provided this dataset and shared it with Max Roser via email. It shows average years of schooling of the population aged 15 and over.
